biography: Ofri is a talented golfer who calls Golf Pirkkala his home club.

He has consistently demonstrated his skill and dedication to the game through his participation in the prestigious Hector Trophée.  This will be Ofri’s fourth appearance at the Hector Trophée, having previously competed in 2023, 2024, and 2025. While he hasn’t yet secured a victory in the tournament, his persistent presence speaks volumes about his commitment and ambition.

Ofri is a player to watch, and his previous performances suggest that he'll be a strong contender in this year's competition.  He possesses a refined technique and a cool demeanor under pressure which makes him capable of significant achievements. While he has yet to claim either the Hector Trophée or the Victor trophy, his dedication and unwavering skill set him up for a strong showing this year.
